short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert a Windesheim Glade (Amazing Challenge SE) to a readable and parsable CSV file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a chrome extension that adds an export button to all glades in the Amazing Challenge of Windesheim SE.

This extension uses the same syntax as the "Taal 20" interpreter made by CalliEve. Please check the GitHub page for a detailed list of mappings.

The export button is visible while creating and editing a solution, as well as in the Glade editor. It will download a CSV file that you can load into the existing interpreter or use in your own interpreter.
